website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight mousse that adds volume without weighing your hair down.
pros: Won't leave any residue in your hair
cons: Not as effective on those who don't have any natural curl to their hair

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, so I was greatly disappointed when it stopped coming out of the can the fourth time I used it. by that time it was too late to return it. I tried running it under hot water but that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridon Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Received the product with masking tape around the top. The product came out like flat beer and smelled disgusting. I've used Redken before that was purchased at the store.It is supposed to be mousse texture and has a nice smell. I'm not sure what this seller sent me but it is not like the Redken product at all.I didn't send it back but I wish I had . I attempted to use it and it did nothing for my hair, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this product for a long time and like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time and like it very much. It is designed to add volume to your hair and is applied as soon as the hair is shampooed and is still wet. This was the first time that I had ordered it. I usually get it from my hairdresser. I was ordering other items and included the Redken Guts Spray Foam. I was VERY disappointed when it arrived. The spray nozzle was completely torn off. Obviously, it doesn't work properly. I won't order it again; I will buy it from some other source. But the product itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Toole

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair, and I can't go a day without this stuff. No build up or greasy look, and you really can't use too much of it. Buildable and very effective. I've been using for 3+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Just not the same
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before, (bought some where different) I don't know if I got a bad bottle or what but it definitely doesn't come out as a foam as is should and it builds up in my hair very quickly.. not sure if I will be buying it from amazon again
customer_reviews.author: EmmieRay

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: I've been using guts for years and will never be out of stock. It leaves my blown-dry hair full and bouncy. It also helps my brush glide through my hair while blow drying. Word of warning, though: This is NOT to be applied like a mousse. It's for ROOT application only. Section your hair and apply to the roots where you want fullness. If you apply it through your hair, your hair may feel oily.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: This product is the very best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This product is the very best I have ever used! It is great for fine hair. Also it leaves my hair shiny and adds volume. Don't know if this is the venue to add the other hair products I use: Pantene volume shampoo and conditioner; Paul Mitchell soft hair spray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective sprayer....on last 2 cans
customer_reviews.text: It's not returnable now. Do not trust the sprayer on this product. I have used and loved Redken Guts 10 spray mousse for many years, but something is WRONG with the manufacture of the spray can dispenser. This product costs too much to behave like a cheap can of insect spray. Will not purchase again and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Something's wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years but the recent 2 bottles that came emit a thin watery very slightly foamy liquid, not the white mousse that is normal. This is after shaking long and hard and even letting it sit in my AC overnight (assuming it got hot in the mail shipment process.) Could it be "old"? Or just defective in the manufacturing process? Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: palmtree

customer_reviews.title: A must have for big sexy hair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best: I am sold for life. It is the best product I could ask for to get big sexy hair!! I have extremely thick hair that lays flat to my scalp from being weighed down. I’ve tried so many different products to get a little lift at the roots. But Redkens 10 when a above and beyond what I could want. I get big gorgeous hair with this product. I use after washing my hair and then blow dry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Sausville

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this product by amazon if you live in a hot climate
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love this product And purchase it from my hairdresser but I bought this one through amazon and received it by mail. The product seems to have been ruined since it was put in my mailbox for delivery and was in the heat for several hours . It does not foam up in the canister no matter how much it is shaken. It comes out looking like watered down milk. I wasted my money by ordering it through you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get gutsy and purchase this product for your wavy short hair.
customer_reviews.text: good price on Amazon with fast delivery...I have wavy/curly hair. I have used this product for many years. It allows me to get the max curl out of my hair without weighing it down or looking icky stiff. The curl lasts two days at least.
customer_reviews.author: P. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Very good product to add body to hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine limp hair. This product gives my hair needed body and makes it easy to style. Works best (for me) to let my hair get mostly dry before putting product on roots. My hair is short.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A bit concerned...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for future travel, have not yet really used it. But I took it out the other day just to try is. I was dismayed to see that the mousse comes out of a notmal type nozzle, which tells me it will easily clog up and quit working. Time will tell, and so will I. I will be back after my trip in September.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: I didn't comprehend the description until I sprayed it in ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't comprehend the description until I sprayed it in to my hand. It's hair spray that foams. It quickly turns back in to a sticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Redken is realistically reliable, really!!! 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.text: All Redken products are superior in my opinion. As a big Refken fan, their products have never once disappointed. I was delighted to discover what I needed on Amazon! Thanks ever so much! I will always be a loyal Redken user! 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product just double check they are clipped. I Got careless and did not check one time and right in the middle of all contraction, one snapped off and hit me in the face. Not the manufactures problem. Facts of life. Let me Telya metal to the face not a good thing. But these provide great variation intention and can build muscle
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff GETS IT DONE! I called my sister and law and told her to buy it immediately. I have very thin, very fine hair. This really gives it some oomf. A little goes a long way. Don’t get carried away.
customer_reviews.author: Franmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product for right purpose...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if hair tends to be sort of curly and sort of wavey - spray on mostly dried hair and squish with fingers a few times all over and keeps hold - don't put too much on or gets stiff. also good for use the second day (per my beautician, actually works better the second day). Unlike the directions (to spray on roots), I just spray all over....
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: It give lasting volume and hold.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. I ran out and tried another product with worse results. Guts kelps my style for several days . A little goes a long way for volume and hold. I am back to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 4th use.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as expected. BUT the can quit dispensing after 4th use. It’s practically full, but won’t spray. I tried washing the tip and everything. Only works about 5 seconds then quits again.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Parks

customer_reviews.title: Mousse for hairstyling
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 2 years. Apply about an egg sized amount on short hair after shampooing and towel drying. Gives hair extra body while blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: RatingtoHelp

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would. First can still had over a half can of product left and nozzle wouldn't spray anymore. Ran under warm water thinking product build up but no go. Tried second can, brand new and same issue. Soo frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product - but did not receive the real product
customer_reviews.text: I used Redken Guts Volume Spray foam regularly. It is a mousse - a substantive white foam, like a foam-style shaving cream. The two cans that I bought in this order do not contain the real thing. The cans emit only a thin, clear liquid, no matter how much they are shaken. I have bought cans directly from Amazon both before and after this order; they contain the real product. So I know it's not that Redken has changed the formula. I will continue to buy this product - but absolutely not from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Suppose to give hair body/fullness
customer_reviews.text: They use this at my salon. Makes my hair have a lot of body. I use this at home my hair is still flat on top. Maybe it’s how they blow dry my hair, never works on me at home.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Meets TSA Guidelines
customer_reviews.text: Since your liquids are limited and I prefer not to pack aerosols in my checked luggage, this was idea! Carried it in my quart zip lock right through security. It worked fine and I will purchase again when I need this size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: JC in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Helps with hair that has a little curl and needs help
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine but with some wave and a little curl. So, it is not a heavy product and helps to style hair better. I found out about it from my stylist. She used it on a lot of different knids of hair. I find it works really well for me. Arrived quickly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: sassy lassy

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist used this when she cut my hair. I didn't think to buy it at the salon. So I bought it from Amazon. So glad I bought it. Best hair product I've ever used!!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Buracker

customer_reviews.title: Only worth it to people who wash hair every day
customer_reviews.text: Product makes hair look oily the next day. Not great for people who don't wash hair every day. Not much left so not worth it to me
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Get a little poof going ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without this product! Have used since Redkin first introduced to the consumer market!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Defective can
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cans, 1 can will not spray. Unable to return or report a problem, I recommend you not purchase if they are sending out defective cans and there is no way to return. You are just out your money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Poor packing. Amazon packers need better training.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that the can of spray foam arrived without its cap. But then, if it had the cap on, it wouldn't have fit inside the box. So instead of using a different sized box, the cap was removed and--- Voila --- it fit. Brilliant! The product itself is great and appeared okay when I sprayed it. Fortunately it didn't spray all over the inside of the box while bonking along in transit.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: safe packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love this volume spray for my fine hair. It's the only thing that works and looks natural- no grease or stiffness. This order came double wrapped and the lid adhered with removable tape to ensure undamaged delivery. Was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives my hair volume
customer_reviews.text: I use this after washing my hair. Spray in hand and then rub together and then through my hair before drying. Have been using for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great product a must have styling mousse
customer_reviews.text: Great product excellent choice for inverted bob cuts 3/25 received a deal with 2 bottles -still loving this product
customer_reviews.author: Dogowner

customer_reviews.title: but the description makes you feel like this is a different
customer_reviews.text: this is not what i got..i got the old version and since i needed that i kept it. if the only thing changes was the packaging, then the order was filled correctly, but the description makes you feel like this is a different prodect
customer_reviews.author: J W Lanfer

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well on hair and very greasy. Very disappointed in product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I have naturally curly hair and where I live (in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and where I live (in the mountains) we have a lot of moisture in the air. As any naturally curly-headed girl or guy knows, moisture means frizz. I use Guts 10 to combat the frizz and it does! I am a firm believer and user of this product. It is a spray type mouse that is not stiff and cuts down on the frizz! Enough said
customer_reviews.author: Rnme2tc

customer_reviews.title: GUTS 10 Volumizing Mousse-Excellent for FINE HAIR
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It's the only hair product that works on my very fine textured short hair. Spray it on your roots and you get instant volume. It's not a harsh product so it doesn't damage or cause fine hair to break off or become brittle. If you want natural looking volume for fine hair, GUTS 10 VOLUMIZER is for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: paby4u

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have never been a mousse fan, but this changed my thinking. I like that you spray it from an upright can onto your hair, exactly where you want it. I absolutely love the fresh, clean, light scent that it has and leaves in your hair. It works to make your hair appear thicker and it gives great hold.
customer_reviews.author: DebandHov

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought it for way less money than my hair dresser can charge. I have seen comments that it is not the real deal, but it looks the same, smells the same, and works every bit as well as what I purchased from my salon.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Grand Rapids

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this at a salon. The hairdresser used it on my very fine, thinning hair. It added a lot of volume to it, and made it earier to cover the cowlicks (swirls). This is the second one I've purchased. It lasts a long time, I have short hair. It really changes the thickness and manageablitiy of my hair. I don't think I will ever stop using it. Wish it was on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: CShattleroe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and was happy to find it in a airline carry-on size! A bit pricy for a 2 oz product, but it will last me for a couple of trips!
customer_reviews.author: RLP

customer_reviews.title: Guts is great- needs packing protection
customer_reviews.text: Guts is a wonderful product that I use daily for lift on my roots- have curly hair and use in tandem with other products. Only issue I have is shipment. Was shipped with no protection, and once again broken lid. Throw in some bubble wrap next time maybe eh? Merci!
customer_reviews.author: Lj McLellen

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about the cap breaking or not working.... I was very excited to try it out. But on the first use the cap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not  for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like what it did for my hair. But I know someone else that likes it do it depends on the type of hair you have.
customer_reviews.author: RoxAnne Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Smells off and does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t seem like it’s right. The products smells like vinegar and does not work as well as the previous cans of product I have used before. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: ERE

customer_reviews.title: Great product~good value!
customer_reviews.text: Have used Guts for a long time Guts spray foam adds body...use before blow drying! I like this product...combine it with a gel to ..as my hair is short now (first time since I was born) lol When my hair was long...I used Velcro Rollers...Now I just "blow & go"....
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: Not the best or the worse
customer_reviews.text: It does hold but it my hair feels sticky. Always wash out that eve.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 20 years. I didn’t realize I was ordering 2 oz travel size spray for $10. I usually buy the large size for $18 but the hair salon I was buying it from closed. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite volumizer
customer_reviews.text: Best volumizer out there. Love the precise nozzle in this. And there’s no itchy scalp after using or flaky product residue.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSeller

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my super fine hair and every once in a while you can find it really cheap at JcPenneys as well
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair mousse that I've ever used, no stickiness or itchy scalp!! WinWin!!
customer_reviews.author: Van Gogh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best product for my hair , gives it some fullness and body
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great Volume
customer_reviews.text: Great body and volume. It’s easy to apply just spray at the base of hair and blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Watery and defective
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this mousse many times and was always happy with it. Unfortunately I didn’t use this one immediately, but when I did it was watery and clearly defective. Because of the time elapsed since purchase the merchant would not exchange, therefore I will toss it and buy from a reputable place in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K.

customer_reviews.title: the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Due to aging, my hair is getting thinner and this product is the best that I have found.... It is a spray that functions like a mouse ..... Great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Defective can
customer_reviews.text: Defective can of mousse. After shaking it, it did not come out like a mousse and it smelled like vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Light hold.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the “hold” I like that I get from other products.
customer_reviews.author: V. Temple

customer_reviews.title: 'ok' product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a product that would give fullness and volume to my thin, lifeless hair and I decided to give this product a try, based on the reviews I had seen on Amazon. I have to say I wasn't impressed at all with it. It didn't leave my hair very manageable and it smells awful. It is by any means not better than other (cheaper) drug store brands. It sure doesn't live up to its reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DC

customer_reviews.title: good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several years and have fine and thin hair. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jetdog

customer_reviews.title: Hate to give two stars unless its price is comparable ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see any special from this product which doesn’t hold longer than the cheaper ones. Its price doubles than a similar product sells in target and Walmart. Hate to give two stars unless its price is comparable to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: LBY

customer_reviews.title: Defective issue
customer_reviews.text: I usually have this as my GO TO hair product, however when I received it, the cap was broken and the spray isn’t consistent. It starts off with a major burst of pressure, then the product oozes out slowly. Can’t return it because it’s flamable. Now what do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Simoncelli Family

customer_reviews.title: Best voluminizing mousse I've found
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely fine hair and I've tried all brands of mousse and this one is the only one that works for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rootimer

customer_reviews.title: This is best of all products I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Poof! I swirl it in a dab with my brush ionizer on low and my hair has a good hair day!
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: I got this after a friend suggested it, used it one time and was not pleased. It made my hair feel like cotton candy...dry, stiff and not silky. I went to return it, and because it's a flammable spray, it cannot be returned. Bye bye $15.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!! I have very fine, limp hair and when I use this it gives my hair great lift and fullness. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: emily, etc., etc.

customer_reviews.title: Body!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to give my thin hair extra body. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.P.

customer_reviews.title: This always gives me great volume and also helps with my frizz in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This always gives me great volume and also helps with my frizz in the humidity if I flat iron my hair. I can tell a difference when I don't use it and still flat iron in the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cat urine!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful!! It literally smells like cat urine. I use the regular size at home and have never smelled anything like the travel size can. This belongs in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: cjiii

customer_reviews.title: I have used Guts 10 for years. They changed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Guts 10 for years. They changed the can and my opinion is--the formula. I could swear it's not the same as my old Guts.
customer_reviews.author: Carda

customer_reviews.title: Can't return!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product faithfully for a decade But...this particular can is not good. It sprays like a hairspray not like the Mousse it should 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product for fine thin hair.
customer_reviews.text: Better than any other volume moose I have used. Does not leave a residue and hair is healthy and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Hair root spray
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I ordered the small instead of large by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: barbara steele

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine told me that there was a product on the market that claims to make fine, thin hair look more fuller! I have female baldness and wanted to give it a try. I could not believe the difference that it made!!! I saw the difference it made with my hair that I recommended it to my friends that also have fine thin hair and they were amazed also!!! REDKEN GUTS 10 is my favorite hair product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i did not like this product because it gave my hair very little body and my hair needed washing more often.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Complete style control
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Spray mousse, but not your ordinary mousse. This stuff adds volume and control. I love it. Works great for my fine straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sticky. Stiff. Suave works better!
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky. Makes hair stiff and doesn't hold well. Not at all worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Best product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have naturally curly hair this is the best product.
customer_reviews.author: paulette peros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes my fine hair have volume and texture and is a huge timesaver!
customer_reviews.author: complex electra

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: I need my Guts. Finding travel size is tough, The price was a bit high, but I got what I wanted,
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great product that helps give volume to my hair without ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product that helps give volume to my hair without heaviness or stickiness. Helps keep the style in for days with just morning 'touch ups'! I will definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Lotta Mee

customer_reviews.title: The product works well !
customer_reviews.text: Hair product to use after washing hair and towel drying.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen P. Louvis

customer_reviews.title: Great product but
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it was damaged when received and only sprayed for a couple if uses. However Amazon gave me credit for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped give my fine hair more body.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Purdie

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I have purchased it previously. However, this one arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to use too much.
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay. Be careful about how much you use. It can make your hair very stiff to wear you can't run a comb or brush through it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah R.

customer_reviews.title: Love Redkin Guts10
customer_reviews.text: Love Redkin Guts10. The product from this merchant had good spray power and clearly was newly manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tomassetti

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Since I am somewhat housebound these days it's wonderful that I can get it shipped to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great mousse product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. Glad to find it via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Granger

customer_reviews.title: that the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I received the order. It is fine. I am trying to delete the items in my cart prior to today. Can you help?
customer_reviews.author: Don Millenbruch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t spray! Would give a zero star but isnt one. Never worked!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love this, but in the black cartridge, not the silver one!
customer_reviews.text: The illustration her is of the old packaging and my Guts 10 came in the black packaging that is the new one. It is just what I like to give a lift and hold to my very fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: 80Annie2012

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. It makes your hair fuller and doesn't leave any residue. You dont even know it's there. I'll be using this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite way to add volume.to the hair
customer_reviews.text: To get 'overall' volume into your hair, you must use a mist spray. Very hard to find!! It's like a hair spray, but you add it onto your hair when it's wet. Works great.... and you don't get that clumpy, 'not mixed in' treatment that most volumizers give. Gives the extra body, without being sticky or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Musumeci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well when in Maui and plan to use it every day at home
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair product. Have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: patti skinner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have short textured hair and this product is fabulous for volume! I put it on with damp hair and dry it. I don't use any other product than this one. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chagnon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This volume spray works well, but I there are other Mousse Foams that I like much better. I went back to WEN Foam volumizer because is gives a more natural look and isn't so hard on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lyn Pettengill

customer_reviews.title: Love this producy
customer_reviews.text: Love redken. This spray is for a very light spray. Never leaves hair all sticky and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Brn2bme

product_meta.title: Redken Guts 10 Volume Spray Foam | For All Hair Types | Provides Body, Volume & Anti-Frizz Protection | Medium Control
product_meta.description:
Size:10.58 OunceRedken Guts 10 Volume Spray Foam is a volumizing mousse suitable for all hair types including thick fine, color-treated and natural hair. Guts 10 works to give a bold, hair root lift effect for all over volume with a natural feel. This volume spray adds texture and body to your look. This medium-control hair mousse controls frizz and fly-aways while offering flexibility to your bold, gutsy look.

BRAND STORY
Redken 5th Avenue NYC is a professional haircare and haircolor company dedicated to providing science backed products, inspiring education and unparalleled creativity for consumers and stylists alike.
